name: Chronozine
description:
This is my entry for "a jam about time". You dash through levels while avoiding lasers and try to reach the goal in minimum time. To avoid getting skewered by lasers, you get a nice slo-mo ability.

You are given a maximum of 3 stars at the end of each level depending upon how fast you  were. This is purely for feedback purposes. You can play the levels out of order.

To 3 star all levels, apart from good reflexes, you need a balance of:

  • Decision making: taking a few hits can help you cut down time; the question is which hits do you accept
  • Curiosity: there are many non-obvious paths :)

Note: The game works best with a controller. Mouse also works but takes a bit more practice to get used to.
